Proceedings of the J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference

wikitext.*:
'''Dr. Stephen Yandell''' is Assistant Professor of English at [[wikipedia:Xavier University (Cincinnati)|Xavier University]] in Cincinnati, Ohio. He has written several articles on the [[Inklings]] [[C.S. Lewis]] and [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], and gives an undergraduate class of Tolkien.

==Bibliography==
===Articles===
* [[1995]]: ''[[Proceedings of the J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference]]'':
** "'A Pattern Which Our Nature Cries Out For': The Medieval Tradition of the Ordered Four in the Fiction of J.R.R. Tolkien"
* [[2006]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia: Scholarship and Critical Assessment]]'', entries:
** "Return of the Shadow"
** "Sam"
===Lectures===
* [[1 December|December 1]], [[2005]]: "Box Office Inklings: C. S. Lewis, J. R. R. Tolkien, and the New Middle Ages" ([[wikipedia:Wilmington College (Ohio)|Wilmington College]])
